text.text_translated:
Sometimes we dream about a phone call from an old friend.  
Sometimes we dream about the death of someone close.  
These dreams just happen.  
They are not a message about the future.  
We often forget our dreams about these things.  
We forget them when they do not happen.

best_attempt.text_translated:
Sometimes we dream about a phone call from an old friend.  
Sometimes we dream about the death of someone close.  
These dreams are probably the result of coincidence.  
They are not a message about the future.  
We probably choose to forget all the times we dream.  
We forget such events when they do not happen.
